citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50 am on
10/15/2015.
Owner reached by text was unavailable for inspection. License cancellation form emailed to facility owner.
